name: Them's Fightin Slimes
description:
Which Slime will reign supreme!?!  Duke it out in this local 1v1 fighting game.  

Control the Hover Slime using WASD and fire projectiles with E and Spacebar.
Control the Saucer Slime using the arrow keys and fire projectiles with Right Shift and Right Control.

Exit the game by pressing the ESC key.

Break powerups with your projectiles to take advantage of them.  4 powerups that can increase your movement speed, increase your attack speed, give you a healing shield, or freeze your enemy in their tracks!
